May 6, 2006 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Jonathan Pippen (Trombone) - Tredegar Best Horn: M. Franey - Tredegar Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £125, 3rd £110. 6 bands competed
Jan. 4, 2010, 6:38 p.m. June 30, 2020, 3:48 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Garry Cutt Whitsun Wakes
2 Parc and Dare Band Craig Roberts The Essence of Time
3 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs The Year of the Dragon
4 Tylorstown Band Gary Davies Paganini Variations
5 Abergavenny Borough Band Alun Williams Tallis Variations
6 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard Energy
Withdrawn Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
